storyInfo: After leaving Yumen, Qiubai searches for the remnants of the Shanhaizhong gang. Her chase leads her into their den, where she finds a child. After confirming that he only ended up there because of a misunderstanding, she decides to escort him home.

attributes.content: Mom, is Dad going far away again? For how long this time?
The snow and ice upon the river are about to melt. The rain this year has been just right, and it doesn't seem like there will be a drought or a flood.
The newly reclaimed land upstream isn't a whole lot, but it should be enough to grow rice for the family to eat.

Mom, can you try talking Dad out of it? So he can set aside his 'business'? I don't want new clothes or beautiful jewelry. I just want us to have an ordinary family life. That's what's most important.
I'm... kind of scared...

attributes.text: From a poor village to a prosperous town, from green saplings to a field of weeds.
Straw shoes traverse a thousand li, from tall mounts and vast lakes comes one's home.

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*....
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: There's a cliff... up ahead...
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Dammit! I'm really not gonna get away this time...
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Don't panic, you can't afford to lose your cool... Even if you can't win in a fight, there should be enough traps along the way to make her eat it.
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: When I manage to catch her, I'm gonna need to teach her a hard lesson... for daring to look down on me...
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Tired of running yet?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: How did you–
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Stay back!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: You look young, but you've got a hefty bag of tricks. Did the one who taught you to hunt ever tell you that traps meant for beasts won't hold a man?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Besides, aren't you worried that you'd land yourself an extra charge if someone were to fall into one of your traps? Intentional damages?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What a joke... intentional damage? That's nothing! I've got a rap sheet... too long to list!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: So what you're telling me is, if I strike you down here, then your death would be deserved?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That's right!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: I mean... no, definitely not!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: You stay away from me!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: See this bag of explosives here? Come one step closer and I'll pull the trigger. No matter how good you are at kung fu, I'll take you down with me!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Alright, I'll stay put then. You answer my question.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Don't think you're gonna get anything out of me!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: How did you come to know that band of robbers over in that cave?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Hah, come to know them? I'm their leader.
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: You might've made short work of my boys, but don't get cocky. I swear, I'm gonna avenge them!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Leader? At your age?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh? Got a problem with that? Go ask every village within ten li and see who hasn't heard of the fearsome 'Fang Xiaoshi.'
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: You'd be scared to death if you knew the terrible things I've done!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Ridiculous...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Twelve hours earlier...
Xiaoshi! Boss!
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: What's going on? Our enemies looking for trouble?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Am I finally gonna get to fight someone? Can you bring me along this time?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Damn it all, the guys who went to Yumen somehow pissed off a she-devil! She's been rampaging through our men on her way here!
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: It's too late to pack your stuff, just start running!
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: What are you talking about? Just one woman?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You guys looked pretty tough when we were showing our moves before, so how come you can't even beat a lone woman?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Shut up!
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Cut the crap. Where's the burdenbeast you were in charge of?
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Um... I sold it.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You <i>sold<i/> it?!
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Weren't you the one who told me to take it to get something to eat?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You dumbass! I told you to ride the burdenbeast into town to trade the gems we looted, and you sold off the burdenbeast too?!
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: That bags of rocks? The butcher didn't even know what those things were.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: He saw our burdenbeast was pretty sturdy, so he gave me a good price. Half in cash, the other half in jerky.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You little––!
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: How long have we been stuck in these mountains? What's the point raising a stupid burdenbeast anyway? It ate more than us, and who knows when it might've attracted another tuskbeast over.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Ma de! Why'd I ever pick up a little shit like you? You're gonna be the death of me! Why I oughta–
attributes.name: Panicked Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: What's a kid doing here?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Who... who the hell are you?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: No wounds. Guess you weren't involved in what happened in Yumen.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I know Shanhaizhong's depravity well, but I never expected them to get a little kid involved... Looks like there really is no limit to how low these people will stoop.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I have no idea what you're talking about!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Hey, lemme cut you a sweet deal. I'll let you off the hook for taking out my boys, for the time being.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Step aside, and I'll pretend I never saw you. Then, we'll each go our own way–
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I didn't give you permission to leave.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I told you, stay back!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Last warning! I've got explosives...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The boy feels only a gust of wind blowing past him. The cloth bag in his arms is ripped apart, beast jerky and various knickknacks fall to the ground.
Among the knickknacks is a protective talisman carved from a wooden plaque strung on a thick iron key. Painted upon it in conspicuous vermilion brush-strokes are the characters, 'Moushan Village.'
A talisman... from Moushan?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Give it back!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Is this the key to your home?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What's it to you?!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: A kid with a family to go back to should not be running around like this.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You're still young, so it's not your fault you don't understand the people you've gotten mixed up with... But, you at least should be able to tell good from evil.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Even if you weren't a part of their plot, if their accomplices ever came knocking on your door, do you know what would happen to you?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Who are you to lecture me on good and evil?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I could also take you to the authorities, and you could explain yourself there.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Though, that would be a little troublesome for me as well...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'll take you home and let your family sort things out.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: No way!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I'm not going back! Over my dead body!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: That's not for you to decide.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The boy pulls a short knife from his waist. He extends his arms out straight, and the tip of the knife shakes uncontrollably.
Don't make me do this!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: A real man's not scared of death. How can he just bow his head and surrender?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I'm not going with you, no matter what. Kill me, if you have what it takes–
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Very well–
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Though the woman is clearly two meters away from him, the moment her voice rings next to his ear, the same side of his body goes numb.
Before he can react, a cold blade is already pressed against his throat.
So, you're afraid of death after all.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Good. That means you're not a complete idiot.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: There will always come a time when a man must answer for his words and actions. Anyone can say stupid things, but not everyone has fortune on his side.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What... do you want from me...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Show me the way. I'm taking you home.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: This is the last town before the mountains, and there is only one inn to be found.
The place is not particularly spacious, and the two occupy a table in the corner.
The moment the boy's rump lands on the chair, his gaze starts darting around left to right, causing the patrons at the next table to look over.
Qiubai gently places her sword on the table.
No one can save you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I know, I know. Stop pulling that thing out to threaten people for no reason.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: They have been traveling for two weeks. One chases, the other flees. One is angered, the other cowers. Yet through this, they've formed a tacit understanding of sorts.

Head due north from this town, pass through a deserted forest, and you'll see a river at the northernmost end. On the other side is a mountainous area, and there's only one way in. Just follow the road and it'll take you there.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: There should be a few villages in the mountains, but I've heard some have relocated over the years. Can't say for sure if the 'Moushan Village' you're looking for is still there.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: How much longer do you think it'll take?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The mountain roads are hard to traverse. Even if you try to rush it, it'll probably still take a week.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Oh right, spring is coming. The weather's starting to warm up, and beasts will be on the move. Be careful, if you're in a hurry.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Appreciate it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You told me you left home to 'become an adventurer,' but it turns out you haven't made it far from home... At first, I thought you were deliberately leading me the wrong way.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Well, the Jianghu is big, and I barely just set out on my journey before I ran into you...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Besides, I'm not stupid. If I led you to some uninhabited wilderness, wouldn't we both starve to death?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Even if I was trying to get away, I'd come up with a better idea.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You sure know how to handle yourself.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Let's eat first. Who knows when next we'll be able to have a good meal after we leave town.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Order whatever you'd like.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Anything? You're paying?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I don't have much on me, so if I end up not having enough to cover it, I'll leave you behind to do dishes.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You jest, my friend. A small eatery like this only has enough offerings to sate your hunger.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Ugh, you'd better not expect me to hold back. Hand me the menu!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I want this one, this one, this one... Actually, give me one of everything!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Excuse me, young sir, are you sure the two of you can...?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: (Writes on the table with tea)
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: ('I've been kidnapped–')
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: (*gasps*) ––!
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: ('Get help–')
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Are you done yet?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Almost. Let's go with this for now!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Okay... Alright...
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: To the washroom. What, are you gonna follow me?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Don't try any funny business.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That kid just signaled to me that he's been kidnapped...
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: I didn't notice anything out of the ordinary when those two walked in. I thought they were just siblings... I have no idea what's going on...
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Are they inside right now?
attributes.name: Security Guard

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: That woman... wouldn't follow me here, right...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Hmph! Keep dreaming, if you think you can catch me.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: What awful luck...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: So much for the Shanhaizhong. I thought I was joining a pretty awesome gang, but they ended up getting taken out by one woman... And now, I'm running for my life here.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Didn't make any money, didn't learn kung fu, and even the bag of jerky I got out of it is gone now.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi sits down on the cold, hard ground.
He curses twice, but that sound is overpowered by his stomach growling.
A young man wandering the Jianghu, the world of kung fu, his growling belly empty; the sky is high and the clouds distant, nothing around him but vast emptiness.
I should've had a couple mouthfuls of food before running off... Where am I supposed to go now...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I told you, you only get three strikes.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: How did you–
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: My patience has limits.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Why won't you just leave me alone?!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: If I leave you alone in the wilderness, you'll die.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: So what if I die? What do you care?!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: My whole life, nobody's ever given a damn if I live or die.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Why should others care about a life that you don't yourself want?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What the hell do you know...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You've never experienced a life of wandering ever since you were a kid, living by yourself with nobody to rely on.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Stop being all pretentious! How could a powerful swordswoman like you possibly understand–
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: (*gasps*) ––!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The boy turns around, only to realize that he is not the only hungry creature in the woods. From the trees' dusky, mottled shadows, a tuskbeast slowly emerges.
The tuskbeast's blood-red eyes flicker like candles in the dark night, its low-pitched growls making the grass and trees quiver and cower.
H-Help...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Don't move!
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'm not...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Don't make a sound. Don't run. And don't turn your back on it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Don't panic. Make your way towards me slowly. Get behind me...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I... can't...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Careful now–
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Perhaps due to the loose fallen leaves beneath his feet, perhaps due to his nerves, the boy staggers and falls to the ground.
The tuskbeast catches the scent of his fear, keenly seizing the opportunity to hunt. It rushes out at almost the same time as the swordswoman.
On the battlefield, the claws of the tuskbeast should have been no threat at all to the sword.
Had there not been a child in need of protection behind it.
Here, eat up.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I ruined your jerky, so here's some roast to make up for it.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: In what way?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Are you talking about the scratch I got from the tuskbeast, or about how mad you've made me?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: This... is for you.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: It's medicine my dad taught me how to make. He always takes it with him when he goes hunting, and it's good for treating scratches and bites from wild beasts.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: How do I know there's no poison in it?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The boy draws out his knife and makes a deep cut, then pours some powder out from the medicine bottle to apply to the wound.
Though he grits his teeth in pain, he firmly resolves to not utter a sound.
Now do you trust me?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You sure took your sweet time, but you're still my hero.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Hmph. So this is what tuskbeast meat tastes like... Ugh, it's tough and gamey.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Consider yourself lucky to get to eat cooked meat in the wilderness at all.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You do have a point... When I was with those men up in the mountains, it'd be months between a single bite of meat.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Are you talking about your 'boys?' Even the villains known far and wide couldn't get enough food to eat?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Why are you making fun of me...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I've seen my fair share of kids your age running away from home after arguing with their family, but I've never met a kid so desperate to be the bad guy.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: ...I don't want people looking down on me.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: What does it matter if you're good or bad? If nobody's scared of you, then you're gonna get bullied.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Who taught you that nonsense?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I figured it out myself... from experience!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You're only half-correct.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: When you become feared, it's true that nobody will bully you anymore. Instead, they'll join hands to get rid of you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The only way avoid making enemies is to avoid treating others as enemies.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I... can I ask you a question?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Your kung fu is so powerful... Where did you learn it?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: If you get thrown out there to fend for yourself across the Jianghu for five years, then get tossed into war for another five, you'll be at a similar level. If you survive.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Also, I had an exceptionally strong teacher.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Even stronger than you?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Much stronger.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Then, if I train hard from now on, how long would it take for me to reach your level?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Ten years.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Ten years?!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Assuming you survived, that is.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: M-Ma'am...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: What did you just call me?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What would you say to taking me as your disciple?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I'll follow you. Whether you're a wanderer or a hero, you'll be my master from now on!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I'm not taking disciples. And I'm not about to just casually hand my kung fu to somebody else.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Besides, with how crafty you are, if you use the techniques I taught you to do evil, wouldn't that be my fault?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I promise! If you teach me kung fu, and I become as strong as you and nobody bullies me, I'll obey every word you say and be a good person just like you.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You think I'm a good person?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I... I think so...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: After all, you saved me and gave me food to eat...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You're so strong, but you still spend money to buy things instead of stealing. You're nothing like the others.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: So, you're not totally incapable of telling good from evil.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: But, I still don't understand why you're trying to save me.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Is it because heroes like you always butt into people's business?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You've already asked me several questions.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Ma'am... You don't have to take me as your disciple, but at least let me follow you. Anywhere's fine, just don't force me to go home.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I want to ask you something as well.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I can see you still keep the keys to your home with you, so why do you refuse to go back?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: ...I'm not ready yet.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: When I ran away from home, I made up my mind that I wouldn't go back until I've done something worthwhile.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Are your folks still there?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I haven't seen my mom as long as I can remember, but my dad should still be there... I don't have any other relatives.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: All the more reason for you to go home. You have the heart to make your father worry about you?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I don't think me going back would make him happy... Everyone in the village hates me, looks down on me, and bullies me... You wouldn't understand at all.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Same thing I told you before. If you want to get along with people, don't treat them as your enemies.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Besides, how much hatred could anyone possibly have for a boy your age?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I said it, didn't I? I've done a ton of bad things. You'd be scared to death if I listed 'em off for you.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: In other words, I'd rather die than keep living as a nobody.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You wouldn't say that, if only you knew how many people there are across this land who'd do anything for a chance to live.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Forget it. I can't beat you in a fight or in an argument. Whatever you say goes, I guess.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: But one more question: why won't you let me follow you?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: A life of wandering has its risks. For a boy like you, it's better to have a place to call home than to be adrift outside.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What about you then? Where's your home?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: ...My home is long gone.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What does that even mean? Was it a Catastrophe, or was it demolished to make way for a nomadic city?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Long gone means long gone. The place is gone, and the people are gone.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: We've been talking about me all day, but why don't you tell me about yourself? I mean, you haven't even told me your name!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Qiubai. 'Qiu' as in hatred, 'bai' as in white snow.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I am a nobody, with no stories to tell.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Well, whatever. If you don't feel like talking, so be it. I know heroes like you love to act all mysterious.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Some stories remain untold because they're unpleasant.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: If you've eaten your fill, go rest up. There's a long road ahead of us, so conserve your energy.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.text: 'Pass the woods, cross the river, and you'll enter the mountains.'

attributes.content: Though it is less like a mountain, and more like a forest made up of mountains.
One mount connects to the next, the peak of one mountain connected to the foot of another. There is no end in sight, no road to traverse.
It's as if the happenings of the outside world have no bearing upon what occurs deep in the mountains. It is too remote, and even time itself can be walled off by distance.
We're almost there! It should be around here somewhere!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You made one hell of a detour just to climb this mountain. What are you trying to do?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I heard that if you stand on the peak here, you can see all the way to Yumen!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The boy tries his best to stand on tiptoes, gazing westward from the cliff. The wild grass grows rampant, and he can see only a faint line of dark yellow at the farthest edge of the horizon. A look of disappointment creeps onto his face.
Qiubai knows that out of sight, the wounded nomadic city is still crawling along the barrens, nervously licking its wounds.
I passed by here a few years ago. Used to be more desolate.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You've been here?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: It's been a while.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: For the Chidao, right? Look over there!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: On the other side of the cliff, a gray trail winds along the terrain and extends all the way to edge of the horizon, quite eye-catching in contrast to the barrens.
'Chidao,' a Yanese infrastructure project for Catastrophe avoidance, resource transportation, and aiding people living in remote areas.
Tens of thousands of such roads interconnect more than a hundred nomadic cities across the country's endless wilderness.

It stretches across wild, untamed mountains and erects bridges over low-lying areas. The supply stations set up along the roads are like neatly-sectioned bamboo nodes, bringing life to every place they reach.
If it can be said that the gods abandoned this barren land, then humans are the ones who once again laid out its veins.
All under heaven is strife, but humanity does what it can.
After I left home, I would sometimes see Chidao construction teams. But, what's the point of repairing these roads?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: It's not like they can pack up and leave the same way nomadic cities can, so won't they just get torn up when a Catastrophe hits?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The places that nomadic cities don't reach depend on these roads.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Repairing them after they're destroyed is a matter of necessity. The material cost is irrelevant.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: But very few know... Very few remember, that there are always people doing this work.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Not long ago, a Catastrophe swept across this mountain headed for Yumen. It caused great damage to the city, but also left behind a heroic tale.
Out here, far from civilization, there were no casualties, no buildings destroyed, and little trace of what took place.
At this moment, only the construction team is still hard at work here, busy repairing this unassuming stretch of road.
I heard that following this road west will lead you to Yumen. You said you'd been all over the place before, so have you been to Yumen?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I have.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: When I was still hanging around those bandits, I heard they were getting some guys together for a big job in Yumen. But, they didn't think I could hold my own in a fight, so they wouldn't bring me along.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Consider yourself lucky.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: What kind of place is it? Are there lots of heroes with great kung fu? A bunch of mighty warriors and weapons?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: No... It's mostly just ordinary people, going about their ordinary days.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Yumen travels along the desert, and is always followed by the wind and sand. How could the people there possibly have an easy life?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I'm not afraid of hard work, as long as I get to do something meaningful... Sure beats being stuck in this stinky ol' ravine.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Either way, you're not gonna talk me out of it... I'm only heading back home because you told me to, but give me a bit to prepare, and I'll be back out on the road in no time!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I swear, the next time I stand here, the name of Fang Xiaoshi will be known far and wide—no, I'll become a hero known to all!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You'd better worry about becoming a good person first. If I hear anything about your fearsome notoriety again, I'll pay you a visit you won't enjoy.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You always know how to rain on my parade...
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Anyway, we'll reach Moushan after crossing this mountain.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: I know the way back from here.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The light of dawn clears away the mountain mist, and the wind carries a few wisps of chimney-smoke in oblique trails.
Unmelted snow can still be seen atop the peaks in the distance, plots of farmland spread out thinly along the foot of the mountains.
The heavy rain must've hit halfway through the plowing season, the soft soil that had been pushed into ridges washed into a muddy mess once more.
In the places that have not yet been plowed, clumps of soil are packed together tighter and tighter, the heads of wheat from the last crop still droop.
At the end of the Chunfen equinox, working the fields proves to be difficult.
The villagers in the fields put down the plows in their hands, straightening their backs while rubbing their waists.
Took long enough for the sun to come out. Looks like today will be a fine day, with just the right amount of sunlight.
attributes.name: Plowing Villager

attributes.content: Gotta till the fields again while I still can...
attributes.name: Plowing Villager

attributes.content: Is it really you?!
attributes.name: Plowing Villager

attributes.content: Fang Xiaoshi...? You're Fang Xiaoshi, aren't you?!
attributes.name: Plowing Villager

attributes.content: Oh, is that Uncle Dayuan? You bet, look who's back!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Why are you staring at me like that? Are you still mad about that one time I accidentally poured fertilizer into your burdenbeast feed trough?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: You... You're still alive?
attributes.name: Plowing Villager

attributes.content: Of course I am.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: But, I haven't seen you in three years, and your back's gotten even more crooked.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Jian gui le... damn it all!
attributes.name: Plowing Villager

attributes.content: I've gotta go tell the Elder!
attributes.name: Plowing Villager

attributes.content: See, what'd I tell you? Everyone here hates me.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Looks more to me like they're afraid of you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: How many bad things did you do to make everyone so scared?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You should ask who started it.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: People are the same wherever you go. They always find the boy who's easiest to pick on... But now that I'm back, I'm not afraid of them anymore!
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: What, never seen such a run-down place before?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: All I'll say is you haven't seen anything yet.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Grr.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: But I can add, this is the first time I've seen a temple like that at the entrance to a village.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And over here, why's there a fresh grave?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Because people die. Is that so strange?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The only thing is, I dunno which family they're from or why they were buried next to the temple.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Well, whatever. I might not know who you are... But if you're buried here, you were probably one of the villagers.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Death is a release anyway. At least your suffering's over.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: The boy turns sideways and bows in the direction of the grave. Though his words are frank, his posture is serious.
We're almost there. My place is just up ahead.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Why'd you stop?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: ...Forget it. Can't hide from it anyway. I'm not afraid.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Dad, I'm back.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: He steps into a tiny shack of wood and mud, to find nobody inside. Various trinkets and knickknacks can be seen all around, but they are organized neatly.
Seeing the leftover food on the stove, the boy seems to let out a sigh of relief.
That's strange. All the stuff's still here, but nobody's home?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Maybe he's out in the fields? I'll go look for him.
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Dad...? Dad?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Where are you...?
attributes.name: Fang Xiaoshi

attributes.content: Stop him! Don't let him get away!
attributes.name: Agitated Villager
